summary: A letter from attorney Anthony V. Lombardino to Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss, requesting an interview with his client, former FBI Special Agent and inmate Richard Taus. Taus claims to possess important information regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein, Ghislaine Maxwell, and an individual named J. Doe who visited him in prison.

persons.name: Richard Taus
persons.role: Former FBI Special Agent, inmate, potential informant
persons.context: Former FBI Special Agent and decorated Vietnam War veteran currently incarcerated at Clinton Correctional Facility. He claims to possess important information regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, Ghislaine Maxwell, and a visitor named J. Doe.

persons.name: Anthony V. Lombardino
persons.context: Attorney representing Richard Taus, writing to request that the U.S. Attorney's Office interview Taus regarding information he claims to have about the Epstein case.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Recipient of the letter, to whom the request for interviewing Richard Taus is directed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of information Richard Taus claims to possess, specifically regarding his death.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as another subject about whom Richard Taus claims to possess relevant information.

connections.description: Lombardino states he represents Richard Taus and is writing on his behalf to request an interview with the U.S. Attorney's Office.
Taus claims an individual named J. Doe visited him while he was an inmate in prison, and he possesses relevant information about this person.
Taus claims to possess important information relative to the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
Taus claims to possess information regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Attorney Letter Requesting Interview
events.description: Attorney Anthony V. Lombardino sends a letter to Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss requesting an interview with his client, Richard Taus, regarding information Taus claims to have about the Epstein case.

locations: The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Richard Taus, a former FBI Special Agent and decorated Vietnam War veteran, is currently incarcerated at Clinton Correctional Facility.
Taus claims to possess important information regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein and information regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
Taus also claims to possess relevant information about an individual named J. Doe who visited him while he was in prison.
His attorney, Anthony V. Lombardino, is formally requesting the U.S. Attorney's Office interview Taus to obtain this information.
